name: Offroad Trike
description:
Offroad Trike is an extremely challenging offroad trike parking game where you have to overcome a series of tough mission courses on a powerful Offroad Trike. Carefully maneuver your trike through over a dozen fiercely difficult mission courses that provide a true test of your Trike riding skills.

Features:
* Stunning 3D Graphics
* Intelligent Missions
* Addictive Experience
* Smooth Game Play
* Real Animations
